channel.title: Server.ini removing help

item.title: Server.ini removing help
item.dc:creator: @nickehh nickehh
item.description:
@nickehh wrote:

Hey… I need help… I downloaded a source today… And It makes you play on this specific client… I am wondering how to take this out…

[code]Server.ini

ClientRequired=0

WorldId=3
ServerPort=43594[/code]

[code]server.java

try {
File f = new File(“server.ini”);
if (!f.exists()) {
misc.println(“server.ini doesn’t exist!”);
}
Properties p = new Properties();
p.load(new FileInputStream("./server.ini"));
int client = Integer.parseInt(p.getProperty(“ClientRequired”)
.trim());
world = Integer.parseInt(p.getProperty(“WorldId”));
serverlistenerPort = Integer.parseInt(p.getProperty(“ServerPort”)
.trim());
if (client > 0) {
misc.println(“Enforcing Devolution client requirement”);
enforceClient = true;
}[/code]

Please I need help… Ive tried taking both out… with no luck!

Read full topic
